org.eodisp.ui.common.binding
Class DataObjectAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.jgoodies.binding.beans.Model
      com.jgoodies.binding.value.AbstractValueModel
          org.eodisp.ui.common.binding.DataObjectAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jgoodies.binding.beans.Observable, com.jgoodies.binding.value.ValueModel, java.io.Serializable
public class DataObjectAdapter
extends com.jgoodies.binding.value.AbstractValueModel

This is an adapter for DataObject's. It can be used to bind the properties of such an object to a component.

Version:
$Id:$
Author:
eglimi
See Also:
Bindings, Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

DataObjectAdapter

public DataObjectAdapter(java.lang.Object dataSource,
                         java.lang.String propertyName)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Default constructor.

Parameters:
dataSource - The data object that holds the properties.
propertyName - The name of the property that will be used for the binding. The data object must hold a property with this name.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if either the data object is null or if it does not hold a property with the given name.
